definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near

sentences.english: The instantmessaging feature appears to be one part of Microsoft's response.
sentences.chinese: 即时通服务似乎是微软对此举动作出回应的一部分。

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即时通讯是中国互联网最为普及的网络应用之一。

sentences.english: Cane probes utilize modern, instant-on optic principles.
sentences.chinese: 杆式探头采用现代的即时启动光学原理。
你想得到即时网页链接？

sentences.english: So what would an instant-replay system look like?
sentences.chinese: 那么，即时回放系统是什么样子呢？

sentences.english: Longitudinal and transverse modulators, photorefractive effect, real-time holography.
sentences.chinese: 纵向与横向调变器，光折射效应，即时全像术。

sentences.english: B stitch in time saves nine.
sentences.chinese: 即时缝一针省患上未来缝九针。

sentences.english: Changes are instantaneous, with immediate user feedback.
sentences.chinese: 修改是即时的，立即会有用户反馈。

sentences.english: Fees will be charged for real-time quotes of Hong Kong Stocks only, details are enclosed overleaf.
sentences.chinese: 将仅就港股即时报价收取费用，收费详情载于背页。

sentences.english: It wants pleasure and it wants it now.
sentences.chinese: 本我追求快乐的即时满足。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation and Hong Kong sign interpretation are available for Core Sessions.
sentences.chinese: 大会将于核心会议提供即时中英及手语传译服务。

sentences.english: You can restrict messages, friend requests, comments, group invitations and instant messages.
sentences.chinese: 你可以限制留言，交友请求，邀请圈子和即时信息。

sentences.english: The RTS (real time strategy) video game genre has been defined by this game.
sentences.chinese: 星际争霸是即时战略游戏的代表。

sentences.english: V / shtml Save all instant messenger passwords into HTML file.
sentences.chinese: 保存所有即时通讯密码的HTML文件。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
